Footer.address: Türkler Mah. Kargı Çayı Cad. No:10 Alanya/Antalya

Homepage.subtitle: Welcome to Azura World Hotel Alanya – All Inclusive Concept
Homepage.title: 5-Star Comfort, All-Inclusive Experience
Homepage.text: Located in Türkler, Alanya/Antalya, Azura World Hotel is a 5-star resort opening in 2025 with an All-Inclusive concept. It features 188 rooms, 6 floors, and 2 elevators. Check-in is at 14:00, check-out at 12:00. The beach is 1 km away with a complimentary shuttle service. Pets are not allowed.

TwoImageSection.subtitle: AZURA WORLD HOTEL UNFORGETTABLE MOMENTS
TwoImageSection.title: Discover the Azura World Hotel experience now!
TwoImageSection.text1: Azura World Hotel serves with an All-Inclusive concept in the Türkler region. It offers a pleasant holiday with comfortable room options, spa areas, and all-day dining points.
TwoImageSection.text2: Relaxation and entertainment come together with an Indoor Pool, Oasis Pool, and an Aquapark with 13 different slides. The beach area is 125 meters long; sun loungers, umbrellas, cabins, WC, and shower facilities are available.

Accomodation.subtitle: Select the Stay That Suits You Best
Accomodation.title: Comfortable Accommodation Options
Accomodation.roomText1: Deluxe rooms are between 22–24.99 m². Features 1 French Bed or 2 Single Beds + 1 Sofa Bed. Maximum capacity is 3 adults.
Accomodation.roomText2: Superior rooms are between 25–40 m². Features 1 French Bed. Maximum capacity is 2 adults.
Accomodation.roomText3: Deluxe Family rooms are between 43–53 m². Features 2 bedrooms (1 French Bed + 2 Twin Beds). Maximum capacity is 4 adults + 1 child.

Essentials.subtitle: Discover Our Extraordinary Services
Essentials.title: Everything for Your Comfort
Essentials.text1: The 125-meter beach area features 120 sun loungers and 60 umbrellas; cabin, WC, and shower facilities are available. The beach is 1 km away; a shuttle service is provided.
Essentials.text2: Indoor Pool (1 main + 1 kids pool), Oasis Pool (1142 m²), and an Aquapark area with 13 slides (530 m²) are available. Aquapark hours: 10:00–12:00 / 14:00–17:00.
Essentials.text3: Breakfast/lunch/dinner buffets at Milos Restaurant; Saffron A’la Carte (reservation required); desserts at Patisserie Art; snack & beverage service at Azura Beach.
Essentials.text4: Mini Club and children's playground are among the complimentary services.
Essentials.text5: Fitness Center, Wi-Fi, beach towels/loungers, umbrellas, and beach shuttle service are free of charge.
Essentials.text6: Indoor Pool, steam room, Turkish bath, sauna, and salt room are free; massage services are paid. Working hours: 08:00 – 20:00.

BackgroundSection.subtitle: Comfort and Pleasure at Azura World Hotel
BackgroundSection.title: All-Inclusive Holiday Experience
BackgroundSection.text: Azura World Hotel offers a pleasant holiday with its All-Inclusive concept, accommodation, dining, pools & aquapark, spa, and additional services. Hours and services may change according to seasonal conditions.

Rooms.subtitle: COMFORTABLE ACCOMMODATION FOR YOU AND YOUR FAMILY
Rooms.title: Azura World Hotel Rooms
Rooms.text: There are 188 rooms in total at Azura World Hotel. All rooms feature TV, tea-coffee set, safe, minibar, VRF air conditioning, electronic card entry, and high-speed Wi-Fi. Bed linens are changed every 3 days; towels are renewed upon guest request.

Room1.title: Deluxe Room
Room1.text: Deluxe rooms are between 22–24.99 m². Maximum capacity is 3 adults.

Room2.title: Deluxe Family Room
Room2.text: Deluxe Family rooms are between 43–53 m². Maximum capacity is 4 adults + 1 child.

Room3.title: Superior Room
Room3.text: Superior rooms are between 25–40 m². Maximum capacity is 2 adults.

Parallax.subtitle: Basic Amenities Provided in the Room
Parallax.title: Everything You Need Awaits You in Our Rooms
Parallax.text: All rooms feature TV, tea-coffee set, safe, minibar, VRF air conditioning, electronic card entry, desk, high-speed Wi-Fi, balcony (table-chair), scale, lighted vanity mirror, emergency phone, and hair dryer. Pillow menu is paid.
Parallax.text2: Bathroom set and basic bath products are available.
Parallax.text3: Secure entry with electronic card system.
Parallax.text4: High-speed Wi-Fi and TV are available.

FamilyRoom.subtitle: Spacious Accommodation Option
FamilyRoom.title: Deluxe Family Room
FamilyRoom.text: Deluxe Family rooms are between 43–53 m² and offer a spacious accommodation area.
FamilyRoom.span3: Bed Layout: 1 French Bed + 2 Twin Beds

RoomFeatures.subtitle: COMFORTABLE ACCOMMODATION
RoomFeatures.title: Deluxe Family Room
RoomFeatures.text: Deluxe Family rooms are between 43–53 m². TV, tea-coffee set, safe, minibar, VRF air conditioning, electronic card entry, desk, and high-speed Wi-Fi are provided.
RoomFeatures.text2: Standard room amenities are available in all rooms. Bed linens are changed every 3 days; towels are renewed upon guest request.
RoomFeatures.sofa: Details: Additional Sofa Bed is available.

BackgroundSection.subtitle: PRIVILEGED SERVICES
BackgroundSection.title: Deluxe Family Room Advantages
BackgroundSection.text: All-Inclusive concept, daily dining options, and on-site facilities provide a comfortable stay.
BackgroundSection.list1: A’la Carte Dining: 1 complimentary use (reservation required) for stays of 7 nights or more.
BackgroundSection.list2: Spa & Wellness: Indoor Pool, steam room, Turkish bath, sauna, and salt room are free; massage services are paid.

RoomTour.title: Deluxe Family Room – 360°
RoomTour.text: Details: Take a virtual tour inside the room.

OtherOptions.subtitle: Choose the Room That Suits You
OtherOptions.title: Discover Other Comfortable Options
OtherOptions.text1: Compact and comfortable Deluxe room option.
OtherOptions.text2: Superior room option for guests looking for a larger living space.

FantasyRoom.subtitle: COMFORTABLE AND SPACIOUS ROOM
FantasyRoom.title: Superior Room
FantasyRoom.text: Superior rooms are between 25–40 m². TV, tea-coffee set, safe, minibar, VRF air conditioning, electronic card entry, desk, and high-speed Wi-Fi are provided.

RoomFeatures.subtitle: COMFORTABLE ACCOMMODATION
RoomFeatures.title: Superior Room
RoomFeatures.text: Superior rooms are between 25–40 m² and offer a comfortable stay with standard room amenities.
RoomFeatures.text2: TV, tea-coffee set, safe, minibar, desk, and high-speed Wi-Fi are available.

BackgroundSection.subtitle: PRIVILEGED SERVICES
BackgroundSection.title: Superior Room Advantages
BackgroundSection.text: Offers a pleasant stay with All-Inclusive concept and facility amenities.
BackgroundSection.list1: A’la Carte Dining: 1 complimentary use (reservation required) for stays of 7 nights or more.
BackgroundSection.list2: Spa & Wellness: Indoor Pool, steam room, Turkish bath, sauna, and salt room are free; massage services are paid.

OtherOptions.subtitle: Choose the Room That Suits You
OtherOptions.title: Discover Other Comfortable Options
OtherOptions.text1: Spacious family room layout and standard room amenities.
OtherOptions.text2: Compact and comfortable Deluxe room option.

DeluxeRoom.subtitle: COMFORTABLE AND STYLISH ACCOMMODATION
DeluxeRoom.title: Deluxe Room
DeluxeRoom.text: Our Deluxe rooms offer both comfort and elegance together.
DeluxeRoom.span3: Bed Layout: 1 French Bed or 2 Single Beds + Sofa

RoomFeatures.subtitle: Comfort Meets Elegance
RoomFeatures.title: Deluxe Room
RoomFeatures.text: Deluxe rooms are between 22–24.99 m². Features all modern standard amenities.
RoomFeatures.text2: Standard room amenities are available in all rooms. Pillow menu is paid.
RoomFeatures.sofa: Details: Additional Sofa bed is included.

BackgroundSection.subtitle: PRIVILEGED SERVICES
BackgroundSection.title: Deluxe Room Advantages
BackgroundSection.text: Offers a pleasant stay with All-Inclusive concept and facility amenities.
BackgroundSection.list1: A’la Carte Dining: 1 complimentary use (reservation required) for stays of 7 nights or more.
BackgroundSection.list2: Spa & Wellness: Includes daily free use of spa areas.

OtherOptions.subtitle: Choose the Room That Suits You
OtherOptions.title: Discover Other Comfortable Options
OtherOptions.text1: Spacious room plan and standard room amenities.
OtherOptions.text2: For guests looking for a larger living space.

HandicapRoom.title: Handicap Friendly Room
HandicapRoom.subtitle: Comfortable accommodation in compliance with accessibility standards

RoomFeatures.title: Room Features
RoomFeatures.subtitle: Accessibility
RoomFeatures.text: There are 5 rooms suitable for disabled access at Azura World Hotel. Accessible WC in public areas and Pool Lift support for the pool are available.
RoomFeatures.text2: Our handicap-friendly rooms are specifically designed for easy access.

BackgroundSection.title: Comfort and Independence
BackgroundSection.subtitle: Accessible design
BackgroundSection.text: Everything has been considered for a barrier-free holiday in all common areas and rooms.

OtherOptions.subtitle: Other Options
OtherOptions.text2: For guests looking for more space.

BeachPools.subtitle: RELAX & REGENERATE BY THE SEA
BeachPools.title: Beach & Pools
BeachPools.text: The 125-meter beach area features 120 sun loungers and 60 umbrellas; cabin, WC, and shower facilities are available. Oasis Pool (1142 m²), Indoor Pool, and 13-slide Aquapark (530 m²) areas offer joy throughout the holiday.

TwoImageSection.subtitle: RELAXING MOMENTS BY THE SEA
TwoImageSection.title: Discover the Beach Area
TwoImageSection.text: Relax all day at the beach area with sun lounger and umbrella options. Cabin, WC, and shower facilities are available.

BeachCarousel.subtitle: SUN & PLEASURE BY THE SEA
BeachCarousel.title: Azura Beach
BeachCarousel.text: Snack & Beverage service at the Azura Beach area is served between 12:30–16:00.

BeachGif.subtitle: Areas Designed for Every Moment
BeachGif.title: Pools and Aquapark
BeachGif.text: Relaxation and entertainment are offered together in the Indoor Pool, Oasis Pool, and Aquapark areas.

PoolSection.subtitle: Dive Into Our Exclusive Pool Selection
PoolSection.title: All Pools at a Glance
PoolSection.text: Our pool and Aquapark areas have a wide range that appeals to all ages.
PoolSection.text1: Oasis Pool area is 1142 m². Depth is 140 cm. Loungers: 140 / Umbrellas: 70.
PoolSection.text2: 1 main pool + 1 kids pool. Area: 100 m² + 12 m². Heating applied seasonally (between 01.11 - 31.03).
PoolSection.text3: The indoor kids pool area is 12 m² and offers a safe swimming experience.
PoolSection.text4: 13 different water slides. Pool area is 530 m². Hours: 10:00–12:00 / 14:00–17:00.
PoolSection.text5: The Oasis Pool kids area is 14.7 m² and is specifically for our little guests.

Restaurants.subtitle: Carefully Crafted Taste Experiences
Restaurants.title: Restaurants
Restaurants.text: Within the All-Inclusive concept, buffet services at Milos Restaurant; reserved service at Saffron A’la Carte; dessert service at Patisserie Art are offered. Freshly squeezed fruit juices are extra charge.

TwoImagesSection.subtitle: GASTRONOMY JOURNEY
TwoImagesSection.title: Taste Experience at Azura World Hotel
TwoImagesSection.text: Within the All-Inclusive concept, services are offered in different areas at various times of the day. Hours may change according to seasonal conditions.
TwoImagesSection.list1: Milos Restaurant (Floor B): Breakfast, Lunch, and Dinner buffets.
TwoImagesSection.list2: Saffron A’la Carte (Floor B): Special dinner service (Reservation required).

BackgroundSection.subtitle: A UNIQUE FEAST OF TASTE
BackgroundSection.title: Milos Restaurant
BackgroundSection.text: Discover the best examples of international cuisine at Milos buffets.

CarouselSection.subtitle: Reserved Option
CarouselSection.title: Saffron A’la Carte
CarouselSection.text: Reservation is required. One complimentary use is granted for stays of 7 nights or more.

TwoImagesSection2.subtitle: SWEET BREAK
TwoImagesSection2.title: Patisserie Art
TwoImagesSection2.text: Indulge yourself with cake, cookie, and fresh dessert options.

CarouselSection2.subtitle: All Day Options
CarouselSection2.title: Other Service Areas
CarouselSection2.text: Dining options are available at various points of the facility at different times of the day.
CarouselSection2.text2: Our lobby bar is open 24 hours. Free alcohol service is between 10:00 – 02:00.

BackgroundSection2.subtitle: REFRESHING DRINKS
BackgroundSection2.title: Discover Our Bars
BackgroundSection2.text: Enjoy your holiday with your drinks at Pool Bar and Lobby Bar.

Bars.subtitle: SPECIAL BEVERAGE EXPERIENCES
Bars.title: Bars
Bars.text: Oasis Pool Bar is at your service between 10:00–00:00, and Lobby Bar is open for 24 hours.

TwoImageSection.subtitle: Perfect Beverage Experiences
TwoImageSection.title: Beverage Service Areas
TwoImageSection.text: Add color to your holiday with our alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverage options. Hours may change according to seasonal conditions.

BackgroundSection.subtitle: A UNIQUE TASTE FEAST
BackgroundSection.title: Cool Down and Relax
BackgroundSection.text: You can get your drinks all day at Pool Bar and relax 24 hours at the Lobby Bar.

Carousel.subtitle: Discover Our Beverage Menu
Carousel.title: Bars
Carousel.text: Service hours of our bars may be revised according to the market and seasonal conditions.
Carousel.text1: 24 hours usage opportunity; free alcohol service until 02:00.
Carousel.text2: Refreshing cocktails and drinks by the pool.
Carousel.text3: Complete your Aquapark joy with your drinks (Extra fee).
Carousel.text4: Refreshing beverage service at the beach area.

BackgroundSection2.subtitle: A UNIQUE FEAST OF TASTE
BackgroundSection2.title: Discover Our Restaurants
BackgroundSection2.text: Step into the world of gastronomy.

Entertainment.subtitle: Entertainment & Activities
Entertainment.title: Entertainment and Experiences
Entertainment.text: A holiday full of Aquapark, game room, and various activities awaits you. Program and usage conditions may change according to the season.

GridSection.subtitle: Entertainment World
GridSection.title: In-Facility Options
GridSection.text: Our entertainment areas suitable for all ages are available.
GridSection.text2: B Floor: PS5, Table Football, Air Hockey, and Dart options.
GridSection.text3: Professional meeting area with 255 m² width and 270 people capacity.
GridSection.text4: Enjoy the sun and the sea.
GridSection.text5: All-day entertainment in our large pool area.
GridSection.text6: Heated in winter, cool use opportunity in summer.
GridSection.text7: Our various free and paid services are offered according to the facility.
GridSection.text8: We are by your side for your birthday and anniversary celebrations.

KidsClub.subtitle: JOYFUL TIME FOR KIDS
KidsClub.title: Mini Club
KidsClub.text: While your children are having fun in the Mini Club accompanied by experts, you enjoy the holiday.

TwoImageSection.subtitle: FUN FOR THE LITTLE ONES
TwoImageSection.title: Mini Club
TwoImageSection.text: Safe and fun activities are offered in our children's playground.

CarouselSection.subtitle: Welcome to Mini Club
CarouselSection.title: Entertainment and Play
CarouselSection.text: Our Mini Club provides free service.

OtherOptions.subtitle: Children's Areas
OtherOptions.title: Children's Pools
OtherOptions.text: Our pools with special depths for our children are available.
OtherOptions.text3: Safe slide area specific for the little ones.

Spa.subtitle: RELAX AT AZURA WORLD HOTEL SPA & WELLNESS
Spa.title: Spa & Wellness
Spa.text: Reward yourself with Turkish bath, sauna, and steam room. Massage services are extra fee. Working hours: 08:00 – 20:00.

InfoSection.text1: Relax your body with our professional team.
InfoSection.text2: Free areas are in service between 08:00 – 20:00.
InfoSection.text3: Massage and special treatments are offered as paid services.

GallerySection.subtitle: Renew Your Senses
GallerySection.title: Spa & Wellness
GallerySection.text: The address of relaxation and peace.

CarouselSection.subtitle: PAMPER YOURSELF
CarouselSection.title: Massage Options
CarouselSection.text: Relieve your stress with our various massage types (Paid).

SpaTypes.text1: 100 m² main pool area. Heating is applied in the winter period.

Sport.subtitle: MAINTAIN YOUR FORM
Sport.title: Sport & Fitness
Sport.text: Our Fitness center and courts are at your service for you to keep fit during your holiday.

InfoSection.text1: Our gym equipped with modern equipment is free between 08:00 - 20:00.
InfoSection.text2: Our courts are free; night lighting may be extra charge.
InfoSection.text3: Tennis, basketball, and fitness options are available.

SpaTypes.text2: Professional floor for tennis and basketball matches.

InfoSection.subtitle: Azura World Hotel Alanya
InfoSection.title: Your Ideal Holiday Destination
InfoSection.text: Azura World Hotel is a 5-star All-Inclusive facility with 188 modern rooms, opening its doors in 2025. It is located in the popular region of Alanya, Türkler.

MissinonVision.subtitle: Azura World Hotel Values
MissinonVision.title: Our Mission and Vision
MissinonVision.text: Our mission is to offer our guests a holiday experience at high standards. Our vision is to be the leading accommodation center preferred in the Alanya region.
MissinonVision.clubtext1: We bring holiday joy to its peak with rich dining options, huge pools, an aquapark with 13 slides, and a comprehensive spa center.
MissinonVision.clubtext2: Along with free Wi-Fi, beach service, kids club, and rich activities; we also offer paid airport transfer, room service, and dry cleaning services.

ExploreAlanya.header: Routes That Will Enrich Your Holiday
ExploreAlanya.description1: One of the best-known natural beauties of Alanya, Dim Cave offers a fascinating underground world with its giant stalactites and stalagmites formed over thousands of years.
ExploreAlanya.description2: Unique city and sea views are watched along the line from Damlataş to Alanya Castle.
ExploreAlanya.description3: A natural paradise famous for its walking platforms and waterfalls, with cool waters.
ExploreAlanya.description4: This shipyard dating from the 13th century is one of the best-preserved historical structures in the Mediterranean.
ExploreAlanya.description5: The house where Mustafa Kemal Atatürk stayed during his visit to Alanya, organized as a museum with personal belongings.
ExploreAlanya.description6: A world-famous 2.5-kilometer coastline with golden sands and clear sea.
ExploreAlanya.description7: The historical lighthouse at the harbor entrance is ideal for sunset walks.
ExploreAlanya.description8: A popular beach close to the city center with clear waters.
ExploreAlanya.description9: The majestic castle complex dating back to the Seljuk period, located on a hill overlooking Alanya.
ExploreAlanya.description10: The symbol of the harbor with its octagonal architecture and historical structure.
ExploreAlanya.description11: A historical cave famous for its stalactites and stalagmites, known to be good for asthma.
ExploreAlanya.description12: A rich collection reflecting the history of Alanya and its surroundings from ancient times to the present.
ExploreAlanya.description13: A stop waiting to be discovered for history enthusiasts with its ancient ruins and columned streets.
ExploreAlanya.description14: A beach known for its wide coastline, with walking and cycling paths.
ExploreAlanya.description15: A castle mosque with a peaceful atmosphere reaching from the Seljuk period to the present.
ExploreAlanya.description16: A legendary cave which is a popular stop for boat tours.
ExploreAlanya.description17: A hidden cooling spot in nature for those seeking peace.
ExploreAlanya.description18: A cute stop on the coastline organized for street cats.
ExploreAlanya.description19: The monumental structure famous for its sunset view, located in Ancient Side.
ExploreAlanya.description20: One of the most famous natural beauties of Antalya, a relaxation and rafting area.
ExploreAlanya.description21: The most favorite cooling point of Alanya with its restaurants and recreational areas by the water.

Icon1.list1: It is important for visitors to dress appropriately.
Icon1.list2: Women should enter by covering their heads.
Icon1.list5: Permission should be obtained to take photos.

Icon2.list5: Children should be kept under control.

Icon3.list1: Act with the awareness of protecting nature.
Icon3.list3: Lighting a fire is only free in permitted areas.

Icon4.list3: Quota limits should not be exceeded.
Icon4.list4: Protected species should never be hunted.

Icon5.list1: Precautions should be taken against high temperatures.
Icon5.list2: Sunscreen with at least 50 factor should be used.
Icon5.list3: Attention should be paid to water consumption.
